title: Trade, 2020 Elections & Herman Cain
itunes:title: Trade, 2020 Elections & Herman Cain
description:
Kevin spoke with Harmeet Dhillon, RNC Committeewoman for California, Civil Rights Attorney and Republican National Lawyers Association, Board Member & Jennifer Holdsworth, Democratic Strategist and MWWPR Senior Vice President of Issues Management. They discussed U.S.-China trade talks, 2020 elections and Trump's nomination of Herman Cain for the Fed.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
